group_1.narration: The school festival that took place@right after I transferred to Mizuna Girl's Academy@was an event I'll never forget...
Moving to a new school...@Having trouble adjusting to school life...@A Witch hunt going wrong in an unfamiliar city...@All of these burdens piled up, and@my Soul Gem turned black and cloudy...
Tsumugi later told me that if I hadn't been in Kamihama,@I wouldn't be here anymore.
But, I can't even say I'm happy about that,@because my Doppel caused a lot of trouble for others...
The seeds produced by my Doppel are@far more powerful than the seeds I normally create,@and it caused a series of trouble.
I wanted to do something about them,@but when the seeds come into contact with my magic power,@they sprout and cause even more trouble...
There was no one I could ask for help, so I@snuck into the school at night to try to collect some seeds,@where I met Tsumugi and her friends...

group_1.textCenter: [chara:770600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, wasn't someone there just now?!

group_1.textCenter: ...*Pant*...*Pant*...@I just...ran without thinking...
(They're all working together to deal with trouble...)
(I can't do it, but...maybe they can...)
...An opportunity...I have to...use that...

group_1.narration: Hoping that they could catch the culprit,@solve all the trouble, and make sure the@school festival is able to be held safely...@I created three "seeds of opportunity".
"An opportunity to find the culprit"@"An opportunity to deal with the seeds"@"An opportunity to stop the culprit"
I really wanted to make a lot more of them@so that they would definitely get the opportunities@but my magic power was just barely enough to make three...

group_1.textCenter: Then I just had to get ahead of them...@And plant the seeds...!

group_1.narration: It was a lot of work,@and the "opportunities" took a strange form, but...

group_1.textCenter: ...*Pant*...*Pant*...@I was able to get ahead of them...
Please work, "an opportunity to deal with the@seeds"...
*Pant*...*Pant*...@...managed to make it in time...
"An opportunity to stop the culprit"...
(There's a lot of materials in the old school building,@so even if there's trouble at night...)
(It'd cause serious problems...)
(I can't do anything about the seeds...)
(I'm sorry...please work...)
...Phew...not here yet...?
(Now, all that's left is for them to@figure out my identity.)
(If they can catch me and deal with@the seeds...)
(The school festival can be held safely...@So I'll have taken responsibility, right?)
I'll plant the seed of opportunity...
[chara:770600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
(I have to hide for now...!)
(The materials room...@It's dark, so it'll be okay...it's okay...)
(...Phew...looks like she's gone...)

group_1.narration: As I was planning to sneak out after@Tsumugi and the others leave the gym,@I heard a voice pondering the culprit's motives...

group_1.textCenter: Yes, I'd like to talk to her...

group_1.narration: When I heard Tsumugi's words...@I was happy to learn that she was trying to@communicate with me.
And so, when I relaxed...
...*Clatter*

group_1.textCenter: [chara:770600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](I knocked over materials...!)
(I...I have to get out of here...!)

group_1.narration: I was in trouble and had to escape through@the loading dock behind the stage...
But as I was running away, I thought...@It might be justice for me to be@hunted down and caught like this...
In this way, the "seeds of opportunity" that I planted@turned out to be the keys that helped@Tsumugi and the others solve everything.

What I expected to happen next was...@The Magical Girls who hunt me down@and apprehend me would solve all the problems!@The culprit would be revealed to the police and the school,@and the school festival would be held safely.
Although the actual outcome was completely different@from what I had expected...
But they were so kind to me that I wondered if@I should even be allowed to enjoy it after causing all this...
Thank you...@I will cherish this photo forever...
(Someday...I hope I can repay you...)
